Our collaborative infrastructure is designed to support expedition-based workflows, streamlining data collection, processing, and analysis across diverse environments. Each tool serves a specific role in our research and data lifecycle, from real-time field data entry to long-term archival and analysis. This interconnected system enables seamless collaboration, robust data management, and scientific rigor at every stage
